plot: The all-access feature-length documentary on the making of Michael Bay's blockbuster "Transformers: Dark of the Moon," including interviews with the cast and crew, appearing on the 3D Blu-ray collector's edition.
title: Above and Beyond: Exploring Dark of the Moon
plot_es: The all-access feature-length documentary on the making of Michael Bay's blockbuster "Transformers: Dark of the Moon," including interviews with the cast and crew, appearing on the 3D Blu-ray collector's edition.
original_name: Above and Beyond: Exploring Dark of the Moon
plot_en: The all-access feature-length documentary on the making of Michael Bay's blockbuster "Transformers: Dark of the Moon," including interviews with the cast and crew, appearing on the 3D Blu-ray collector's edition.
